name: The Wisp (dinopoke)
description:
Welcome to Willow, the Wisp. This is a trial that will test your survival.If you wish to survive to my riddles you must abide. But first, I must suggest that you pay attention to what we mention.

 

“Somebody said, that an object at rest will remain at rest unless a force moves it from its source! However, this clever fella would also tell, that unless otherwise compelled, it will follow it’s own spell!”

Liam Ma - Art
Raven Mason-Uyeda - Art
Alice Hartigan - Art
Ashton Eden - Art
Steve Hughes - Programming
Osam Hamoudhy - Programming
Facundo Calderon - Design
George Mak - Design

Made for the AIE Sydney April 2016 Game Jam. The theme was Motion.
